title: True Mates
description: Werewolves believe that some are fated to find a true mate, someone they were destined to be with that they truly love. Unfortunately for Leigh, she is forced into marriage with an alpha from another pack to create an alliance. 	Alone with an unknown male, with the only understanding of males being her abusive father, she is gripped by fear as she submits to her new husband. Could she ever learn to trust her husband or, better still, love him?	With evil witches willing to snatch unsuspecting werewolves and vampires also trying to cause trouble, Leigh needs to learn quickly how to trust if she plans to survive any sort of attacks that come her way.
author: Julie Cannings
